document.full_text: the euro hit a one-month high on monday, heading toward $1.50 ahead of a european central bank policy meeting later this week, an upward march that could bring commodity prices and emerging market currencies along with it.
document.title: amid debt crisis and slowdown, euro may still rise
lines_and_colors: the euro hit a one-month high on monday, heading toward $1.50 ahead of a european central bank policy meeting later this week, an upward march that could bring commodity prices and emerging market currencies along with it.
